item.title: Crisis shooter game
item.description: Another online shooter is ready to take couch commandos and offer them death matches. You can choose a team mode with the number of members from 4 to 8. Or you can play a war for singles. In the first case, by the way, you can “blame” your comrades, as well as yourself. A good arsenal is provided for the destruction of targets.

item.title: Game Crisis
item.description: The Crisis game only works in those browsers that support Unity. In addition, it is quite “heavy”, and loading can take a long time. However, the wait will be rewarded with a vengeance.

item.title: Game Crisis - ghost team
item.description: Ghost Team is a first person shooting simulator. After downloading, the user finds himself among some ancient ruins. He needs to fight off opponents rolling in waves. At the first level there is only a pistol. The second level is passed with “Kalash”, but the enemies are stronger. You can’t stand still. You need to run, jump, squat.

item.title: Game Crisis 2
item.description: Fans of contra-like toys are invited to try their hand at another online shooter. View, of course, from the first person. Already at the start, there is a bunch of weapons available: a dessert needle pistol, a Kalash gun, a shotgun, and something else. You can choose a team game, or you can run for yourself. Shooting takes place on difficult landscape locations.

item.title: Game Crisis online
item.description: Here is a good fantasy multiplayer shooting game. One single principle works in it: man is a wolf to man. That is, every man for himself. Each character is controlled by real people. Cunning and resourceful. Fortunately, everyone has the same weapons within the same location. It can be a grenade launcher, a blaster, a sniper and much more.
